snippet.title: Somnokid - A shmup/platformer hybrid in which you must construct the stage before battling on it!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://team-bugulon.itch.io/somnokid?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Somnokid is a unique shmup/platformer hybrid in which you must construct the stage before platforming and battling on it.  Stave off your nightmares by slaying monsters, then survive on whatever ground you could build in time!

➡️ More from Team Bugulon https://team-bugulon.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More Ludum Dare 50 games https://itch.io/games/tag-ludum-dare-50?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
